response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its exceptional nature, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am extending an exclusive invitation to acquire the product at a special introductory price of $18,000. I trust this investment will yield significant benefits for you. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 18000}
